name: Amazon Essentials Men's Regular-Fit Short-Sleeve Print Shirt
description: Easy through chest and tapered through waist

rate.comment: I bought this shirt as a birthday gift and referenced another Amazon essentials shirt for size and was surprised that it was accurate. The shirt itself is nice and light so perfect for the warm state we live in! If you're looking for a high-quality shirt, this might not be the right purchase but it seems like a great everyday shirt!

We had my husbands aunts surprise 50th luai and my husband absolutely refused to be compliant. Of course he didn’t want to spend a lot of money on a shirt because he didn’t want to participate as is so this lil number served it’s purpose. Colors were amazing and bright. He got a lot of compliments. My husband is 185lbs 5ft 11in and we purchased a xlg

name: Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel Shirt
description: Contrasting corduroy lined collar and cuffs
Left chest pocket with pencil slot and button closure

rate.comment: I bought one of these shirts several months ago in the Shale Plaid style and was satisfied with the overall quality, so recently decided to purchase another in the Cedarwood Plaid style. I noticed on the label that the Cedarwood Plaid shirt was made in India, while the Shale Plaid shirt was made in China. After one wash/dry cycle following the directions on the label, I found that the Cedarwood Plaid's fabric had pilled much more than the Shale Plaid shirt had after multiple washings. Another thing I noticed is that the backside reinforcement stitching for the top corners of the shirt pocket on the Cedarwood Plaid shirt was done using small pieces of scrap fabric that were already unraveling. Just seemed like a very messy and low quality way of doing it. The same backside stitching on the Shale Plaid shirt was done much more neatly and looks strong.

I have very broad shoulders with a small gut. I'm 5'11 and 215lbs. This shirt was perfect in XL for me.This shirt fits perfectly. A little baggy around the midsection, just a little. Good arm length. Very Soft. It is not what I would call a skinny fit.

name: Amazon Essentials Men's Regular-Fit Cotton Pique Polo Shirt
description: This short-sleeve polo is made with comfortable pique fabric, a double-button placket, and ribbed cuffs for a classic look that never goes out of style
Regular fit through the chest for a relaxed, unrestricted fit with a printed neck label to maximize comfort

rate.comment: I have purchased 20 plus of these shirts in the past six months. The first batch in spring, figuring if any inconsistencies or quality issues arose upon delivery, no problem. Amazon's return policy has always been hassle free. After trying on the fourth shirt and noticing no outstanding flaws or differences, all were simply opened, laundered and hung on a hanger. The material is 100 percent cotton, but assuming they are removed from the dryer immediately (medium heat) - no ironing necessary. No appreciable shrinking is observed and no outliers in the batch.

I don't like this very much. The advice was to buy a size down, which I did, and it's still arguably a bit on the large side. The collar hangs unattractively too, somehow. It's like a supermarket garment. Not very stylish or fitted. And the colour is way off what the photo shows. It's much more green in real life. Adequate but disappointing.

name: Gildan Men's Ultra Cotton Long Sleeve T-Shirt, Style G2400, Multipack
description: Solids: 100% Cotton; Ash Grey: 99% Cotton, 1% Polyester; Sport Grey and Antique Heathers: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; Safety Colors and Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
Heavyweight 6 oz. per sq. yd. fabric made from 100% US cotton
Featuring taped neck and shoulders and double-needle 7/8 collar and bottom hem for long-lasting comfort and durability

rate.comment: I just brought 2 of these to Alaska and they worked great. The fit is good as I got the small size and I'm 5'8'' and 155 pounds with slender build. They're simple and comfortable. They also launders easily. Overall I would recommend these long sleeve shirts.

I don't like this very much. The advice was to buy a size down, which I did, and it's still arguably a bit on the large side. The collar hangs unattractively too, somehow. It's like a supermarket garment. Not very stylish or fitted. And the colour is way off what the photo shows. It's much more green in real life. Adequate but disappointing.

name: Dickies Men's Short-Sleeve Flex Twill Work Shirt
description: CLASSIC WORKWEAR: This relaxed fit button-front work shirt features short sleeves, twin button-flap chest pockets & matching melamine buttons. It's made of a sturdy, machine washable stretch twill blend for lightweight mobility with traditional toughness

TIMELESS STYLE: Modeled on our men's traditional style work shirt, Dickies Flex features a lighter 4.6 ounce mechanical stretch twill for comfort and ease of movement in a relaxed fit that's roomy for all kinds of work activity, or just for a casual look

rate.comment: I need several short sleeve work shirts. I bought two of these as I trust the Dickies' brand. I have not been disappointed and have just bought two more of the shirts.
Was a gift for my son. Bought the XL and it fit perfectly.

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Classic-Fit Short-Sleeve V-Neck T-Shirt, Pack of 2
description: Lightweight jersey cotton blend with stretch

rate.comment: I love that you cannot see through this white shirt. It's is a fairly thicker material. I am 5'5” and weigh 185. I purchased a large hoping it would fit. And it surpassed my

Love these basic T-shirt! I will be ordering more colors. The fabric is super soft and no scratchy tag. The V at the neck is the perfect length and the shirt overall has a great length. It has just the right fit so its not like wearing a boxy men's undershirt but not so fitted to make me uncomfortable about my muffin top (fat hanging over top of my pants). The sleeves are nicely fitted giving the shirt class. I am 5'4'' 140lbs and purchased Medium. I might have fit into a small but have broad shoulders (and thick waistline) and prefer a little room.

name: Ymmie Women's Anette Square Neck Thong Bodysuit
description: Square neckline , Short sleeves , Thong panty with snap gusset, Medium compression

rate.comment: I love the idea of this and thought it would have shapewear built in but look like a t-shirt nope it looks like you're wearing a t-shirt made from shapewear... Like it honest to goodness looks like shapewear -_-Returned

Ok, I am no stranger to shapewear and the tightness that it requires, but this was absurd. I ordered per the sizing chart (and the same size I get their shaping shorts in which I like) but this was way too small to be flattering. I think the issue is that the material is too thin - it's just see through and not strong enough to actually shape you at all. I returned.

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Classic-Fit Long-Sleeve Lightweight Plaid Flannel Shirt
description: Soft-yet-sturdy midweight classic flannel, with an instantly comforting, cozy feel

rate.comment: This is a nice light flannel. It feels soft like flannel but is light and thinner. It has a female cut and fit so it is not boxy yet is also not too tight. The color was nice can go casual with jeans or layer.

This shirt was ordered to use in a play set in 1947 because I had read the reviews which said the shirt was not heavy--exactly what I wanted. I bought it for the play but will wear it for everyday as well. It fits well and washes well.

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Slim-Fit Tank, Pack of 2
description: Soft-yet-sturdy midweight classic flannel, with an instantly comforting, cozy feel

rate.comment: I was a little hesitant on buying because of some of the reviews but these tanks are great. I can fit a small or medium if I want my tops loose so with these reviews I went with a medium. The fit is perfect. Not too long but past the rear, the back is a little higher so your bra wont show but still at a flattering length and the straps are wide. I will definately be adding more tank tops from this collection in other colors.

I pre-washed these and tried them on, and so impressed. I'm 5'10' and they are plenty long and fitted, yet do not roll up like a lot camis I've owned in the past. They are nice and thin, but not overly see-through. For the price and quality, these are much nicer than anything I've found in stores.

name: Under Armour Women's New Freedom Banner T-Shirt
description: Soft-yet-sturdy midweight classic flannel, with an instantly comforting, cozy feel

rate.comment: I really love this shirt. Fits perfectly and is so soft.

Loved the shirt however, the first wash and dry the hem unraveled in the back. Very disappointing for a brand associated with quality sportswear. I should have returned the tee but did not. That is on me, but I will definitely think twice before ordering under armor again.

name: Berkshire Women's 6900
description: Soft-yet-sturdy midweight classic flannel, with an instantly comforting, cozy feel

rate.comment: I was hot with it underneath my clothes . It was comfortable.
Very comfortable!

name: Legendary Whitetails Women's Open Sky Notch Thermal Shirt
description: GREAT FOR LAYERING: Mini waffle fabric construction.
LEGENDARY STYLING: Cute keyhole notch neck with custom thread colors that match to our flannels
Soft-yet-sturdy midweight classic flannel, with an instantly comforting, cozy feel

rate.comment: This shirt is absolutely gorgeous and well-made. My only recommendation is to order a size up. I am a bigger gal and ordered a 2XL (which is the largest women's size they carry) and it is a bit snug through the tummy area.

I usually wear a size medium but for some reason, with these type shirts, I have to go a size up. The large fits me perfectly (I don't wear shirts skin-tight). I'm 5'6' and 150 lbs. The arms are long enough and it doesn't shrink horribly in the wash. I always hang-dry so I cannot tell you if it shrinks in the dryer.

name: Legendary Whitetails Women's Breezy Tunic
description: GREAT FOR LAYERING: Mini waffle fabric construction.
LEGENDARY STYLING: Cute keyhole notch neck with custom thread colors that match to our flannels
Soft-yet-sturdy midweight classic flannel, with an instantly comforting, cozy feel

rate.comment: This shirt is absolutely gorgeous and well-made. My only recommendation is to order a size up. I am a bigger gal and ordered a 2XL (which is the largest women's size they carry) and it is a bit snug through the tummy area.

I usually wear a size medium but for some reason, with these type shirts, I have to go a size up. The large fits me perfectly (I don't wear shirts skin-tight). I'm 5'6' and 150 lbs. The arms are long enough and it doesn't shrink horribly in the wash. I always hang-dry so I cannot tell you if it shrinks in the dryer.

name: Hanes Women's Flat
description: GREAT FOR LAYERING: Mini waffle fabric construction.
LEGENDARY STYLING: Cute keyhole notch neck with custom thread colors that match to our flannels
Soft-yet-sturdy midweight classic flannel, with an instantly comforting, cozy feel

rate.comment: These are perfect for layering on a cool day. 5ft,140lbs and 34b, I normally wear a small in tops, however based on reviews I ordered a medium. Glad I did, arms fit great and it is slightly loose fitting in belly area which is great. Bought the V-Neck and basic round neck, I like both equally. Will buy one more in black! These are a great material that will dry quickly when sweating.

I bought it for the sun protection factor, 50 I understand. I have not tested it yet with that in mind, since Amazon ended up sending me two dark grey (I ordered a light grey as well). The fabric feels very 'slick' i.e., artificial compared to cotton, but who cares, as long as I don't get a sunburn. The other thought I had--since it dries almost instantly--it might be great to take on vacation where you end up washing something in the sink to wear again the next day.

name: Gildan Women's Heavy Cotton T-Shirt, Style G5000L, 2-Pack
description: Made in the USA or Imported

rate.comment: These do not run small *smh* I ordered large thinking they would be baby gap sized based on the reviews. I now have large shirts. I’ll use them to sleep in I guess. They are true to size. Nice fabric. Great color. Yeah. Do it.

I bought it for the sun protection factor, 50 I understand. I have not tested it yet with that in mind, since Amazon ended up sending me two dark grey (I ordered a light grey as well). The fabric feels very 'slick' i.e., artificial compared to cotton, but who cares, as long as I don't get a sunburn. The other thought I had--since it dries almost instantly--it might be great to take on vacation where you end up washing something in the sink to wear again the next day.

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Tech Stretch Short-Sleeve Crewneck T-Shirt, Pack of 2
description: Solid: 94% Polyester, 6% Spandex; Spacedye: 88% Polyester, 12% Spandex
Made in the USA or Imported

rate.comment: Seriously can amazon get any better?! These shirts are great! I love the length and fit! I didn't read the description closely obviously but the material is nice; I assumed they were just cotton but it's the same material and feeling as those 32 degree shirts if you're familiar with those. And those are much more expensive. The neck is a little wider then your average cotton t shirt so it looks a bit more stylish. The only reason I knocked a star off is because the seam on the one shoulder where the sleeve attaches is kind of 'bubbled' for lack of a better term. But it's hardly noticeable - in fact I had a hard time capturing it in a picture! I will definitely be buying these again!I bought a Large and it fits just the way I want it too - loosely and long. I'm 5'1 and 160lbs

I bought these last minute for a trip to Southeast Asia (when Nordstrom's Rack told me my package would be 10 days late it turned into a last minute panic). I absolutely loved them. They were comfortable, looked good in pictures, kept me cool in 90 degree temperatures, and dried quickly when washed.

name: Cutter & Buck Women's Wrinkle Resistant Stretch Long Sleeve Button Down Shirt

rate.comment: I have an authentic Cutter and Buck shirt that I absolutely love. This one looked to be the same style and I ordered the same size but the fit was totally different and the materials felt totally cheap. I question if this is a true Cutter and Buck - and if it is - the quality has really gone down. I do not recommend purchasing. I returned mine.

I do like the shirt.. color is exactly like the pic.. bought it to go with a skirt in the same color.. wash it first it’s a little stiff.. but it does wrinkle but not so much that I would return it.. besides linen of any sort will wrinkle!! I bought a larger size than I wear for that “oversized shirt” look.. good thing I did cause it fit me fine as is! Fit thru the bust… fit bigger thru the hips.. I can tie it up in front and like the look! Would buy in different colors!!

name: Cutter & Buck Women's Epic Easy Care Long Sleeve Tattersall Collared Shirt

rate.comment: The size is totally wrong
Super long torso. If you tuck your shirts, it's for you.

name: Men's Straight-Fit Stretch Golf Pant
description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men's must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

rate.comment: Material that the pants are made of, is nice. The front pockets are great for placing three golf balls per pocket in. There is a pair of rubber band material (non-elasticity) on the inside of the waist band. This stops your tucked in shirt to ride up while your playing golf.

name: PGA TOUR Men's Flat Front Golf Shorts with Active Waistband
description: Whether you're bending over to pick up your ball, mid-swing, or at barbecue with friends, these men’s shorts are a great addition to your golf apparel. The classic fit with a 9-inch inseam gives you a little extra room in the thigh, while the stretch fabric moves with you. An active waistband elevates your comfort, while moisture-wicking technology moves sweat away from your body. Play and look your best with the many performance features of these golf shorts.
tag: Whether you're bending over to pick up your ball, mid-swing, or at barbecue with friends, these men’s shorts are a great addition to your golf apparel. The classic fit with a 9-inch inseam gives you a little extra room in the thigh, while the stretch fabric moves with you. An active waistband elevates your comfort, while moisture-wicking technology moves sweat away from your body. Play and look your best with the many performance features of these golf shorts.

rate.comment: Fit very well and was very comfortable. Most important is that they are 98% polyester and will maintain their shape even after washing.

Bought these to golf, and I am generally impressed with the quality of the “pga tour” clothes brand. The pants fit nicely, the size was accurate and they neat. They aren’t top quality shorts, but these are perfect for any golfer unless you are there to impress with brand names. Giving 4 star because the material quality could be slightly better.

name: HUDSON Men's Axl Slim Jean Rp
description: These blue jeans have a close, comfortable feel and feature a zipper fly, a button closure, and a belt-loop waistband. The 5-pocket construction leaves ample room for your phone and keys as you head out for a day with friends, and the mid-rise waist pairs with the straight-legged, slim-fit style for a modern, tapered profile. Available in multiple colors and sizes, this pant offers an attractive design with a relaxed, worn-in appearance. Made from 92% cotton, 6% elastomultiester, and 2% elastane for optimum stretch and comfort, it is machine washable on a gentle cycle.
tag: HUDSON Men's Axl Slim Jean Rp

rate.comment: Soft, durable pants that have faded beyond all reason. We ordered black and now they're gray. I only wash in child with Tide. My son wore them to work as a server and after a month he was told he couldn't wear them anymore. If color doesn't matter, the material had held up. Good for working where appearance doesn't matter.

name: Men's Classic-Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Flat-Front Chino Pant
description: An Amazon brand - A flat-front wrinkle-resistant dressy chino pant that offers classic style all week long
tag: Men's Classic-Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Flat-Front Chino Pant

rate.comment: Perfect for life on the go. These slacks are what I need to stay looking and feeling good.

These are great, if not perfect, dress slacks. I purchased the blue pair and they fit comfortable, give just enough room to be comfy and not too tight, but damn do they ever collect hairs and random bits and pieces of fluff. I have worn them a handful of times and had to run a lint collector over them twice a day to ensure I do not look like a homeless guy who walked through a petting zoo. I would not call these Wrinkle-Free but certainly Wrinkle-Resistant, by the afternoon of sitting at a desk you will have wrinkles.

The fit in the waist and the length is just what I expected. They are comfortable and affordable, which means that you can get several colors to go with your wardrobe and not worry about breaking the bank.

name: Lee Men's Performance Series Extreme Comfort Straight Fit Pant
description: Just like our founder, H.D. Lee, our passion is helping can-do people do more. We are committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely. We help you chase the things that bring you joy and laughter. The things that make you fearless and hopefully because your passion is what makes you unique. And what moves you, moves us. Move your Lee.
tag: Lee Men's Performance Series Extreme Comfort Straight Fit Pant

rate.comment: In the next batch I received one right out of the box that had a pocket ripped in two sides. Interestingly enough, the pockets are made of a stretchy mesh that is sewn in the center and when you pull them inside out and tug on both sides, you can see the mesh struggle against that thread. This worried me with my other pairs when I inspected them and before another month had passed I already had another hole in my pocket where I keep my keys.

name: IZOD Men's Golf Swingflex Straight Fit Pant
description: Perfect your stroke in comfort. This golf pant is enhanced with a swing flex waistband featuring four-way stretch for ultimate range of motion. Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you dry all day, while a uv-20 finish makes sure you play it safe each round.
tag: IZOD Men's Golf Swingflex Straight Fit Pant

rate.comment: There's absolutely nothing bad I can say about these pants. They fit as I expected, bought the same size as my jeans.Slightly stretchy, lightweight, and a stretchy waistband. Exactly like the Nike's my wife bought me, only a fraction of the price. Get these pants, you won't be disappointed.

Very light weight. Used them in restaurants as work pants since the kitchen was hot they keep cool and not make you fell like your over heating. The elastic waist band makes for a relaxed concert and they don't wrinkle easily and are slightly water resistant.

name: SPECIALMAGIC Golf Pants Men Stretch Slim fit Hiking Pants Lightweight Dress Casual Tapered Zipper Pockets
description: Feel great on the course with this performance-packed golf pant from PGA TOUR. Featuring moisture-wicking properties, enhanced stretch fabric for unrestricted movement, UPF grade sun protection, and an expandable waistband - you'll be prepared for anything the course throws at you.
tag: SPECIALMAGIC Golf Pants Men Stretch Slim fit Hiking Pants Lightweight Dress Casual Tapered Zipper Pockets

rate.comment: I was looking for a lighweight pair of pants for golf. Got rave comments about these. Fits well. Narrow at the calf but overall goodlooking pair with belt loops. Stretching fabric. Also great for hiking.

name: Champion Men's Powerblend Fleece Joggers, Left Hip C
description: Since 1919 Champion has inspired athletes on and off the field with its authentic, American athletic apparel. From iconic Champion active wear to the latest in performance workout clothes for men, women and kids, you'll find quality sportswear for every level of play.
tag: Champion Men's Powerblend Fleece Joggers, Left Hip C

name: Champion Sweatpants Men's Big and Tall Heavyweight Fleece Joggers
description: Closed bottom jersey men workout pants are made from 80% Cotton fabric, heavyweight fleece, breathable and quick dry. These mens sweatpants have 4-way stretch sports material to provide more comfortable feeling; when the movement is strong or the temperature is high, the moisture wicking cool dry fabric can take away the sweat of legs quickly. Heavyweight keeps you warm while you exercise. These casual mens jogger pants can be worn anywhere. Active quick-dri mens jersey sweatpants are elastic waist pants for men, breathable and perfect for the gym or anywhere else. Features: Skin-friendly material keeps your skin comfortable and lets your muscles breathe while the movement. Two hand pockets to securely store your essentials and the trendy looks elastic waistband with functional drawstring can be used freely Quick dry sleepwear pants for men, great for indoor and outdoor activities like jogging. If you're looking for a pair of athletic mens pants, joggers for men, mens sweat pants, with pockets, men's sports sweatpants, or just mens sweats, these Champion Big and Tall pants for men have you covered. rate.comment: It said heavy weight more like medium. We have some old Champion sweats that are truly heavy weight. But it is still nice material and will keep them
It said heavy weight more like medium. We have some old Champion sweats that are truly heavy weight. But it is still nice material and will keep them

name: Wangdo Men's Workout Shorts 7 Running Shorts Athletic Bike Shorts Gym Shorts for Men with Zipper Pocket
description: 【BREATHABLE MESH FABRIC WITH LINING】The men's running shorts is lightweight quick-dry fabric and designed to keep you comfortable for workouts and practice.Increased lining to prevent SEE-THRU,you can rest assured to buy light colors without worrying.【LARGER ZIPPER POCKETS AFTER UPGRADE】Our Gym shorts have been proposed and improved by customers, we made bigger zipper pockets on both sides than before,so you can keep your phone or other valuables safe and secure during your workout.【ELASTIC WAISTBAND & INNER DRAWCORD】Featured elastic can perfect suit your waist. Inner drawstring ensures shorts don’t sliding down when running, which makes you can do the exercises without sorrow and anxiety.
tag: Wangdo Men's Workout Shorts 7 Running Shorts Athletic Bike Shorts Gym Shorts for Men with Zipper Pocket

rate.comment: These are pretty nice lightweight breathable shorts for the gym, and even for casual wear. The pockets are deep, you can definitely fit whatever you possibly need inside of them. The drawstrings are a bit too big, there’s quite the load of slack even when the waist is stretched out. The logos and fabric are pretty average in quality, but they hold up very well. My favorite part about these shorts definitely Hass to be the metal tips on the strings, at the base of the drawstrings, and the zippers. Other than that, these shorts fit well. They right above the knee and when stretching your legs, they come about halfway up the quads. If you don’t like high riding shorts when sitting down, definitely don’t buy these. In terms of sizing, the shorts are definitely fit true to size. The only complaint I have with these shorts is that the crotch area is a little on the less-roomy side. Besides that, they’re a great pair of shorts.

name: Men's Slim-Fit Casual Stretch Khaki Pant
description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men’s must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.
tag: Men's Slim-Fit Casual Stretch Khaki Pant

rate.comment: These are the best pants ever. I'm 6'7' and it's hard for me to find pants that fit me this nice. I'm going to get them in every color.

Being a short guy, it's not often you can find inseams that really fit you. Often I have to take it to the tailors. They also have every single size which is also rare. Normally you have to go up two sizes. The material is ok. I just got it and haven't washed it yet nor wore it around much. I was just stoked by how well they fit! I say the material is only ok because it's pretty much standard like you would find anywhere else. It's not crappy but it's not super fine either.

name: Goodthreads Men's Skinny-Fit Washed Comfort Stretch Chino Pant
description: We've always loved traditional men's chino pants, but we wanted a little more - something that would keep the classic men’s tailored pants style, but add in subtle enhancements that would keep us comfortable no matter what we got into. vineyard vines slim fit Breaker Pants keep all of the tried-and-true style of a pair of classic chinos, with the added stretch and out-of-the-box softness that we (and you) love. They’re the perfect choice for wherever life takes you, as golf pants for men, casual pants for men and so much more. Make sure it’s vineyard vines quality: look for “Ships from and sold by Amazon” at the top of the page, under the product title. At vineyard vines, we think every day should feel this good! We are family owned and operated since 1998. For over 20 years, we’ve been sharing the gift of the Vineyard with everyone we can. Care Instructions: machine wash.
tag: Goodthreads Men's Skinny-Fit Washed Comfort Stretch Chino Pant

rate.comment: I am tall and skinny and these pants fit perfect. It's really hard to find pants. So if you buy these pants I'll be sad because Ill have to walk around naked because all the pants will be gone. I love these pants don't make me pants-less.

First these pants are not skinny, they are slim. Which is fine, that's what I wanted. But beware....I ordered three pairs all the same size: navy, green and british khaki. All 32x28. The navy and green are perfect, the british khaki are too tight. The quality control is not good. But I am keeping all three pairs, because its hard finding good pants in the right size. So just keep that in mind when you order.

name: Vineyard vines Men's Chino Breaker Pant with New Slim Fit Cut
description: They're the perfect choice for wherever life takes you, as golf pants for men, casual pants for men and so much more. Make sure it’s vineyard vines quality: look for “Ships from and sold by Amazon” at the top of the page, under the product title. At vineyard vines, we think every day should feel this good! We are family owned and operated since 1998. For over 20 years, we’ve been sharing the gift of the Vineyard with everyone we can. Care Instructions: machine wash.
tag: Vineyard vines Men's Chino Breaker Pant with New Slim Fit Cut

rate.comment: Ordered two pairs in Stone and white for my husband to try and on, as we will be attending our nieces beach wedding. Was not sure if they would fit and look good. Well, they fit perfectly and look great. He said they are very comfortable and light weight. Stylish too. Was not sure on the color, but my husband wants to keep both pants. A win, win.
These are a tray good fit. Truer to size and very good quality material. Will be back and recommend it especially for the price and able to get in days.

name: IZOD Men's Saltwater 5-Pocket Straight Fit Chino Pant
description: Crafted from a stretch cotton blend, this flat-front chino combines form and function, making it the perfect complement to your active lifestyle.
tag: IZOD Men's Saltwater 5-Pocket Straight Fit Chino Pant

rate.comment: Ordered two pairs in Stone and white for my husband to try and on, as we will be attending our nieces beach wedding. Was not sure if they would fit and look good. Well, they fit perfectly and look great. He said they are very comfortable and light weight. Stylish too. Was not sure on the color, but my husband wants to keep both pants. A win, win.

name: Lee Women's Flex Motion Regular Fit Trouser Pant
description: Just like our founder,  H.D. Lee, our passion is helping can-do people do more. We are committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely. We help you chase the things that bring you joy and laughter. The things that make you fearless and hopefully because your passion is what makes you unique. And what moves you, moves us. Move your Lee.
tag: Lee Women's Flex Motion Regular Fit Trouser Pant

rate.comment: They are pretty good bootleg pants if that’s what you like, I do. I would say they run a little small and the waist is pretty tight with no give. I wear 10P in basically all my pants and I’ve actually lost a little weight recently and a lot of my pants are feeling a little big but these definitely feel tight but wearable if I have my spanx tummy control on. They are like most dress pants and aren’t booty flattering in my opinion but Could just be my booty! I still like them over some of the other horrible pants that I have got and I am keeping them.

I’ve been searching for boot cut work pants, with stretch and pockets for years with no luck. I ordered these pants in 3 different colours/patterns and I wasn’t disappointed. They are the perfect work pant. They also have a reinforced thick waist which makes it so I don’t need a belt. The fit a bit relaxed on my thigh but I can look past that since they fit great in the waist and in length.

name: Lee Women's Relaxed Fit All Day Straight Leg Pant
description: LEE Women's Relaxed Fit All Day Straight Leg Pant. Previously known as the All Day Pant, these pants are made for all day wear with silky-soft fabric and a slight drape. Overall Fit: Relaxed fit pant. Rise: Mid rise, sits at the natural waist. Closure: Zip-Fly with button closure. Leg: Straight fit through the seat, leg, and thigh. Pockets: Four pockets: (2) welt back pockets, (2) front pockets. Inseam: Short 29-inches, Medium 31-inches, Long 33-inches. BRAND HERITAGE: Just like our founder, H.D. Lee, our passion is helping can-do people do more. We are committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely. We help you chase the things that bring you joy and laughter. The things that make you fearless and hopefully because your passion is what makes you unique. And what moves you, moves us. Move your Lee.
tag: Lee Women's Relaxed Fit All Day Straight Leg Pant

rate.comment: Finally found dress pants that fit in length and nicely in the waist. Could have gone a size smaller, but didn't want to take the chance of the waist being too tight. These are a little large in the rear end, but I can live with it. So much so, I ordered 4 more, with different colours.

name: Lee Women's Flex Motion Regular Fit Straight Leg Jean
description: Just like our founder,  H.D. Lee, our passion is helping can-do people do more. We are committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely. We help you chase the things that bring you joy and laughter. The things that make you fearless and hopefully because your passion is what makes you unique. And what moves you, moves us. Move your Lee. Closure Type: Zip-Fly with button closure
tag: Lee Women's Flex Motion Regular Fit Straight Leg Jean

name: Fruit of the Loom Women's Essentials French Terry Pants and Tri-Blend Tees
description: The Fruit of the Loom women's essentials collection features must-have pieces that are essential to every woman's wardrobe. Dressed up for work, or dressed down for comfort, these versatile pieces provide day to night wear ability. The live in open bottom pant is perfect for relaxing with the family or running around town. Made of super soft French terry fabric, you are sure to feel cozy and look stylish. These pants come in a variety of sophisticated colors to elevate your existing wardrobe, and you can find coordinating pieces in the essentials collection to complement this quintessential item.
tag: Fruit of the Loom Women's Essentials French Terry Pants and Tri-Blend Tees

rate.comment: Fabric is darker than shown (I got the grey), material is scratchy, thin and shapeless. Ugly pants and not worth it even at this price point. Instant return. I wear a size 10I got a size Large. They fit awkwardly. It does not feel like they were made for a woman's body at all, the hips are snug and the waistband is loose, the legs are tight until the ankles so they just look terrible.

name: Hanes Women's French Terry Pocket Pant
description: Hanes women's French terry pocket pant is cotton rich for extra softness. The French terry fabric is smooth outside and brushed inside for extra comfort. Side pockets and adjustable draw cord waist
tag: Hanes Women's French Terry Pocket Pant

name: Lee Women's Relaxed-Fit Capri Pant
description: Just like our founder,  H.D. Lee, our passion is helping can-do people do more. We are committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely. We help you chase the things that bring you joy and laughter. The things that make you fearless and hopefully because your passion is what makes you unique. And what moves you, moves us. Move your Lee. Fit Type: Relaxed; Closure Type: Zip-Fly with button closure

rate.comment: My only complaint is that they are not at the waist. Otherwise I like them. I wish Lee would make a category for those who only want at the waist pants. Trying to search through all the options is time consuming and not very fruitful.

Lee Capris fit perfect and run true to size table listed on the site. I purchased the same ones about 4 yrs ago and they are just now starting to show wear. Comfort, quality and durability are the main reasons I’m a repeat customer.

These pants are fine with one exception; the waistband. The waistband is a wide strip of elastic and it is constantly twisted or folded over. Super annoying! And, this also causes the waist to look puffy. You don’t want these pants.

Loves it! The fit is a little bit on the larger side...but I am using them as scrub pants so it's ok like that. The lenght is perfect for me. Very comfy and light. I am 5ft2, 125 pounds and ordered a size small.

name: Nike Women's Unisex Legacy91 Tech Hat

rate.comment: It occurred to me that in all the different apparel I wear for outdoor adventuring, I did not have a red baseball cap! So off to Amazon I went and found this Nike version. Arrived just in time for a 16-mile hike I did up in Mt Charleston Nevada. I'm all about quality dry-wicking materials on strenuous treks and this hat performed beautifully. Even in the heat, my head stayed cool enough not to distract me from pushing on! Fits well too! I have long hair and was able to pull it all back into a ponytail thru the back-adjustable strap area with ease. A great addition to the multitude of head gear I use.

I’m happy this particular style hat is still available. Most Lids and Big 5’s now only carry these without the front two panels structured so the whole entire hat is “floppy” and overall looks pathetic when worn. My only issue is that this item will be packeted and sent out in regular bag. Mine came with a huge crease and opted to take a discount and steamed the damage out as best as possible. Hope they go back to making them like how they use to be. Ordering hats online is such a hit or miss experience.

Great fit. Love that there is a slit for you to tuck the strap in the back. I have a small head and you can usually see the strap sticking out in the back from the front view but this hat allows you to hide it.
Not the same from the photo, got one Nike logo not two, but fits perfectly & comfortable

I always buy the white Nike cap, I have never had an issue before. This cap fits weird and is too large. It looks stupid, the fabric in the front is thicker and doesn’t lay flat with the rest of the cap which is a thin material in the back. The result is that it buckles, or poofs out where the fabric meets when you try to adjust the size. Unwearable, but I’ve already worn it so I guess it’s going to Goodwill. Bummer.

name: Sunday Afternoons Women's Coronado Hat
description: Beach hat or fedora now you don't have to choose. the Coronado is a floppy-brimmed fedora that follows anywhere you go. The fabric blend makes for warm weather comfort and easy packability. Decorative leatherette hatband dresses you up for the links or a late brunch.

rate.comment: I seriously cannot even say how much I love this hat! I ordered 2 different Sunday Afternoon hats not knowing which I would like more. They are both really nice but this one is so nice and versatile, it literally goes with everything!

Very comfortable and stylish, love the wide brim. It was a bit out of shape when it arrived but I put it on top of another hat to help train it a little. Adjustable headband with a pretty print inside.

Nice sun hat with adjustable cloth interior sweat band. Very packable; will bend, squish or twist and then return to shape. Slightly heavier duty than I expected, but I was pleased with that. Dries well after getting wet in the pool, but did take several hours.

This is the Perfect hat. Not to large, not too small, it's just the right size. I was impressed with the quality of the hat. It's well constructed and will be excellent for travel. It is soft enough to pack and easily returns to its original shape. So stylish and can be worn with any outfit.

name: BOSS Men's Logo Twill Cap
description: Boss Green basic base cap with embroidered logo on front in contrast color.

rate.comment: Love the hat!!! The quality is legit thought i would be getting a fake but its legit! And for tge price its perfect!! This hat at there website is $29!! Got it for less then half the price!

I got it for BF, he doesn’t have big head but it looks kind a small and funny.. he didn’t like it at all even tho he ordered it. I wanted to return, but when I tried it on, it looks hot and sexy on me, so we decided to keep it. I think it would look perfect for women. Just FYI
Its comfortable and fits lovely, however i wasn't aware it was coming all the way from America!

name: Tommy Hilfiger Men’s Baseball Cap
description: Tommy Hilfiger hat featuring our iconic flag logo. Chain stitch embroidered logo flag. Adjustable metal buckle closure. Six-panel construction with ventilating grommets. Comfort and style make this Tommy Hilfiger cap perfect for everyday wear. This tommy cap is an essential that's hard to beat.

rate.comment: Hello. I cannot speak for any other business that sells on Amazon, but everything we sell is 100% authentic.

It’s been along time since I’ve purchased a Tommy Hilfiger anything for my husband, the minute I saw the picture of the shot I knew that it looked exactly like the ones he used to where when he was in his 20s, he doesn’t really wear hats anymore now but once he opened it on Christmas morning, he can’t seem to stop wearing it!
Bought this as a gift for hubby and it fit perfect. He usually wears extra large hats and this fit perfect.

name: Rock Band Baseball Cap
description: There Are More Designs And Styles Of Men'S And Women'S Baseball Caps To Choose From In The Store.
size: Cap Height 4.5 Inches, Hat Brim 2.7 Inches, Cap Circumference 22.4-23.6 Inches

rate.comment: Bought this as a gift for hubby and it fit perfect. He usually wears extra large hats and this fit perfect.
Hello. I cannot speak for any other business that sells on Amazon, but everything we sell is 100% authentic.
Its comfortable and fits lovely, however i wasn't aware it was coming all the way from America!

name: EvoShield Flex-fit Hats
description: Pledge your allegiance to America and the EvoArmy with the EvoShield Black USA Flex-Fit hat. The hat features the American flag backdrop on the front logo. With a breathable mesh back for a cool feel, the hat also has a Flex-Fit band for a comfortable fit.

rate.comment: Found this hat in my local sporting goods store, but they only had small sizes. I have a huge melon, so being able to find it here was great. It's exactly what I wanted, and in good shape when it arrived. Not mushed, bent, nor the bill all creased up. So far had it for a couple months, and it's light, breathes easy and was easy to form the bill. I curve mine because Im not a tool with a flat brim.

This is the best fitting hat I’ve owned. Comfortable and awesome quality. It isn’t a flat bill but has a slight bend in the bill, obviously you can bend it to your liking but comes out the box perfect if you don’t like the flat bills.
I love the way these hats fit and last... I have bought just about every flex fit hat that EvoShield makes...

name: Women's Saturday Relaxed Adjustable Cap
description: The cap every athlete needs in her closet. Simple and classic, the saturday cap is the perfect accessory to throw on for a long run or coffee run. Designed with a lightweight, washed cotton twill, embroidered centerfront adidas logo, and adjustable matte silver slider. Bad hair days never looked so good.

rate.comment: Adjustable, comfortable and stylish!! I have wore this hat on several hikes and is still looking white

I love this hat, super cute. I have a small head and it has the metal adjustment in the back and usually so much of the back of hat sticks out but this does not. When I have to run a few quick errands and do not want to do my hair it is perfect. I also do wear to the gym with work out clothes. I am a hat person and I am so happy I found these hats. I also bought a light grey one with white letters. This is a must
I read some reviews that this was to small. It fits my head perfectly. I don't have a small head, nor do I have a large head. It fits and looks great!

name: Carhartt Men's Canvas Cap
description: Fights odors. Wicks away sweat. Previously known as the Odessa Cap

rate.comment: Not a lot to say. Good material. Nice stitching. Doesn't yell at me for my bad eating habits.
I love this hat - totally works for women too. The back is adjustable with Velcro and the hat feels great - very sturdy and comfortable.

If you're like me and do not quite have the flowing locks of mane up top anymore, this is the cheapest and most effective answer to your problems. Forget hairpieces, plugs, implants ect ect. Just stick this bad boy on and reel in the ladies! They'll think you're 22! For an added touch of ruggedness add a button down flannel shirt and you'll have to beat them off with a stick! Here's to your newfound glory! 80 people found this helpful

name: Oakley Men's Tinfoil Cap
description: Fitted baseball cap with curved brim, padded sweatband, and front metal logo icon

rate.comment: Love the cap, fits perfect but I knew my fitted cap size prior to this purchase. Shipping was fast but wish that the packaging was a bit better than a shipping bag.
I liked this hat from the moment I received it. Fit is good, and takes a day or two for elastic to break in for very comfortable fit. Fits well, looks clean, and that's what I was looking for.

I prefer hats with limited logos, and this one has worked perfectly. It holds up to washing great (I have not put it in the dryer). It does tend to show dust and stray hairs (especially if you have a dog that sheds a lot.

name: Brixton Men's Brood Newsboy Snap Hat
description: The brood is an eight-panel cut-and-sew snap cap with custom lining and a metal Brixton ribbed shield.

rate.comment: Real class hat. I’ve tried several peaky blinders style hats before and they’ve been too poofy and mushroom shaped. This one is perfect. Not shaped to your head like a scally, not a ride on top flat cap, it’s a little loose on top, sits low on the head. Couldn’t be happier with it. My head measurement is 23.5”(60mm), got a large and it fits right. It’s not tight but not too loose. Do ya self a fayva and get yous one a these hats, huh
Fitment was on point. My favorite hat so far. I really like it
I got this hot for my dad as a gift for Christmas and he absolutely loved it. It was exactly what I was expecting and fit his head perfectly.

name: Adidas Superlite 2 Relaxed Adjustable Performance Cap
description: The adidas Superlite 2 Relaxed Adjustable Performance Cap is ready for a new adventure any day

rate.comment: These are very light hats and fit well for me. I actually bought a couple more, but one I got the wrong hat, and it was a "womens fit" that didn't show on the website but did on the hat, so just make sure if you get that rose colored one it's a SMALL fit, otherwise I really like the hats. Bought one for my son and he likes it also.

Perfect for a very hot beach day or an outdoor activity. Fits wonderfully and this is my second hat. They have been with me on many international adventures in rain and extreme heat. They were great and served their purpose with style.
Best hat I've ever put on my head! Great quality, perfect bill, smooth and sleek!

name: Baseball Cap Adjustable Polo Trucker Unisex Style Head wear
description: THE HAT:Vintage Distressed Washed Style.100% Cotton Made.Lightweight / Durable / Smooth.Adjustable Metal Buckle Back Closure, Great Fit for Most Head Sizes.Dad Hat, Low Profile Unconstructed.Various Colors To Choose From.

rate.comment: Looooove! I got the darker gray. The hat fit my head right out of the box. No adjusting. The quality is great and this hat is super versatile! The fit is on pointe as well! Low profile and the brim is nicely rounded. I’m a 5’7 female. I wear this hat 3x per week? So much cuter than my 2 second ponytail when I’m playing taxi for my kids or ahem... needing a good shampooing.

LOVE LOVE LOVE this hat!!! Perfect for my female small head. I bought this cause I wanted a hat that actually fit, and I was not disappointed. Other unisex hats have a huge brim, too much space in the forehead area, and sides that stick my ears out unless I tuck them in. Well no more, this is made for women and fits well and still provides sun protection.

Good hat, love to wear hats when I don't feel like doing my natural curly hair. I also love that it doesn't have the Velcro in the back, instead it has the clip so my hair doesn't stick to it like the Velcro hats.

name: Roxy Women's Truckin Trucker Hat
description: Trucker cap with mesh back in various graphics, adjustable back closure.

rate.comment: This is NOT a real roxy hat. I have provided photos where as roxy puts their names all over the hat. This is a cheap knock off with a stolen Roxy Logo and fake Rocy retail tag attached to it. The hat is terrible flimsy material and completely differently shaped than authentic Roxy hats. I am returning it today. It also came in a soft pack with the bill and hat smashed completely flat. Save your time and money and buy a real roxy hat. Not some hat with a tag that says cobra made in china on it... selling these hats as a roxy hat is in fact theft.
Never wore my hat on the last latch before. Runs small or it’s not really a Woman’s hat
My 10 yo daughter loves her new hat. The bill seems a little shorter, which is not a problem, but might be worth mentioning.

name: San Diego Hat Company Women's Poly Dress Hat
description: POLYESTER WOMEN’S HAT – Made from 100 percent polyester, this hat is crafted to look its best each time you wear it, making it ideal for dressy occasions.

rate.comment: Chose this hat for a derby party, very elegant looking, well made too.
I bought this hat, and this one is my favorite so far in my collection. I love the minimalist look and the elegance that projects.

name: Christian Dior Monsieur
description: Vintage Christian Dior gold glasses logo CD oval rounded
size: Lens Width: 53mm | Lens Height: 44mm | Temple Length: 150mm | Nose Bridge: 22mm

rate.comment: Love these! The frame color is perfect. just a nice warm goldish rose color. Also has nice gold earpieces which makes them look more expensive. The polarized brown lens is really nice on your eyes. I live in Hawaii so I have to have polarized lenses. They stay nice and tight on your head and are really comfortable too. They are a little bit bigger than a Ray Ban Wayfarer so a little more style e. But not too oversized of a frame.

I absolutely love these glasses!!! They aren't too big where they are overpowering and they flatter every head shape. I love them because they never get stuck in my hair and the metal earpieces fit perfectly and comfortably around my ears. Also, they actually to a great job blocking out the sun, compared to most stylish sunglasses. These are the perfect glasses to make every outfit look amazing, keep in the car, or wear everyday! Definitely my favorite sunglasses!!

name: Vintage python glasses
size: Lens width: 56 millimeters; Lens height: 47 millimeters; Bridge: 19 millimeters; Arm: 140 millimeters

rate.comment: his is the 3rd pair of Maui Jim sunglasses and their styles keep on getting cuter! I recently broke my last pair that I had for 10 years and took s chance on the orchids. Zero regrets! So happy!

I live in Nevada & the sun shines brightly during the day. I like that I'm not squinting my eyes from the glare when I'm outside. I choose these to try before buying because of price. Compared it to designer wear glasses i.e. Prada, Coach etc. This was a better choice. The price meets the quality & need of what sunglasses are made for. Style, comfort & most important eye protection from sun damage. One person found this helpful

name: Prada Vintage Glasses
description:
HELLO BRO, FOLLOW MY SHOP ✋🏻
REGULAR PRICE DROP AND NEW ITEM'S

rate.comment: Great glasses. This is my 2nd pair. My 1st pair laster 4 years then the lens broke at the screw area. I will get the old pair repaired through maui for $75. They work great for a slimmer face. I definitely recomend these glasses. Take care of them & they will take care of you. Great for fishing or water life. Enjoy
I really like Maui Jim sunglasses. My last pair lasted about 3 to 4 years before they started delaminating at the edges. These were a great deal and arrived spotless.

name: Maui Jim Makaha Rimless Sun glasses
description: erfect for the thrill seeker in all of us, the Makaha features a Clear shell scratch coating, a proprietary, silicon-based hard coat that protects both sides of the lens against scratching. Polycarbonate Lens: For intense sports activities and active lifestyles, Maui Jim Polycarbonate lenses are optically correct to ensure crisp optics. They're lightweight, comfortable, extremely impact resistant, and feature our Clear shell scratch-resistant coating. PolarizedPlus2 Technology: All Maui Jim Sunglasses block glare and UV from all angles, manage blue light, and then boost colors for unmatched color, clarity, and contrast. Neutral Grey Lens offers contrast and the highest available light reduction. Suitable for all light conditions, especially bright, direct sunlight. 12% light transmission.

name: Timberland PRO Men's 38mm Boot Leather Belt
description: This durable leather work belt by Timberland PRO is designed with comfort, durability, and performance in mind.

rate.comment: This belt is very eye catching. It was thinner than I expected and my first thought was "This won't last very long". I don't usually write reviews until I have had the time to test the item against time. This belt has exceeded my expectations. It was far stronger than expected, there is no fraying, stripping weak points that I can see and after months of use, still looks new. I got it on sale during prime week for less than $20, Money well spent.

This belt is a very substantial piece of leather and has a nice solid brass buckle! I have worn it for a few months and it's just now starting to soften up a bit - as you would expect from a real leather belt. I will agree with the other reviewers who said it is sized small - definitely order 1 or 2 sizes above your normal waist size. Leather does stretch over its lifetime, so just make sure it's not *too* big on you to start! Highly recommend this belt for those who want something strong and durable.

name: Timberland Men's Casual Leather Belt
description: Genuine leather belt featuring a leather wrapped keep and antique finished buckle.

rate.comment: This belt is very eye catching. It was thinner than I expected and my first thought was "This won't last very long". I don't usually write reviews until I have had the time to test the item against time. This belt has exceeded my expectations. It was far stronger than expected, there is no fraying, stripping weak points that I can see and after months of use, still looks new. description: This durable leather work belt by Timberland PRO is designed with comfort, durability, and performance in mind.

rate.comment: This belt is very eye catching. It was thinner than I expected and my first thought was "This won't last very long". I don't usually write reviews until I have had the time to test the item against time. This belt has exceeded my expectations. It was far stronger than expected, there is no fraying, stripping weak points that I can see and after months of use, still looks new. I got it on sale during prime week for less than $20, Money well spent.

This belt is a very substantial piece of leather and has a nice solid brass buckle! I have worn it for a few months and it's just now starting to soften up a bit - as you would expect from a real leather belt. I will agree with the other reviewers who said it is sized small - definitely order 1 or 2 sizes above your normal waist size. Leather does stretch over its lifetime, so just make sure it's not *too* big on you to start! Highly recommend this belt for those who want something strong and durable.

name: Champion Men's Stadium Full Zip Jacket
description: Think outside the gym! Champion authentic originals are athletic wear classics updated with the latest in fabric and fashion.

rate.comment: I wear a misses size 8 and the med. fit great! Hits just below butt with room to spare, not sloppy, not sheer. It is not a lined windbreaker, that is what I wanted for spring/summer. Glad I purchased this!
I have got more compliments about this jacket and is just the weight that I wanted, just like the weight of a garbage sack BUT the logos make it very fancy

name: Amazon Essentials Men's Full-Zip Polar Fleece Jacket
description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men’s must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

rate.comment:
After two or three wash cycles now, the fuzz ball shedding issue seems to be going away.
Update: a couple of months later, as I feared, visible signs of wear. Elbows are shiny. I have to conclude the product is not a good value even at its well-below-average price.

I've been wearing Polar fleece since the Army place this into their inventory in 2005. Not only does this keep you warm but is so snugly and comfortable when you sleep. I've worn fleece clothing on the coldest and snowy mountain tops of Afghanistan and it has always kept me warm. If you've ever been stationed in Germany during the winter then you know how cold it gets there but with Fleece sweater I didn't even need a Jacket, its perfect for any condition. I prefer Fleece over cotton cause it wont wont absorb the sweat and soak the material and it wont shrink on you. Love me some Fleece!!

name: Marmot Men’s PreCip Jacket
description: The PreCip Jacket is reliable, value-oriented, full-function rainwear for backcountry and urban travelers alike. The PreCip Men's Rain Jacket features Marmot's comfortable and breathable NanoPro waterproofing technology. NanoPro coating is comprised of densely packed pores small enough to keep water droplets from getting in, but big enough to let water vapor out—providing cool, dry comfort even as your activity level increases.

rate.comment: Great value for the price. Light weight, packable, hood stashes in collar, breathable, pit zips nice for extra breathability. Feels sticky on bare arms, when wearing short sleeve shirt.

A little background: I work as a bicycle messenger in Minneapolis year-round so I was looking for the lightest, most breathable rain jacket out there. This definitely fits the bill, and while you're still gonna sweat while being active in this jacket, it does better than most at breathing out vapor, so I stayed comfortable.

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Lightweight
description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

rate.comment: This jacket checks all my boxes and fits perfectly! I wear a size 6-8 and ordered a medium. Very warm and comfy, good for light rain as well.
VERY HIGHLY RECOMMEND! You cannot beat the cost. It keeps you warm + safe from rain. It is easy to pack in suitcases. So much love! I might even buy another!

name: Outdoor Research Men's Helium Rain Jacket
description: We built a company from a feeling: the urge to get out. It's what drives us. Our tribe is devoted to exploring our outdoor passions and challenging ourselves in the mountains, water, and deserts of the planet we love so much.
